name: Memory & Storage
description: Sector template for memory patents including RAM, flash, registers, and memory controllers.
contextDescription: Memory patents cover storage and retrieval in electronic systems. Key areas include SRAM/DRAM (G11C11), flash memory (G11C16), memory controllers, error correction (ECC), and emerging memories (MRAM, ReRAM). High-value targets include Samsung, SK Hynix, Micron, Kioxia, and all processor/SoC vendors using embedded memory.
scoringGuidance: DRAM patents target high-volume memory vendors (Samsung, SK Hynix, Micron).
NAND flash patents apply to SSDs, mobile storage, and data centers.
Memory controller patents read on all processors and SoCs.
Embedded memory (SRAM, eDRAM) patents target processor vendors.
ECC and reliability patents are essential for enterprise and automotive.

questions.question: What memory type does this patent cover? Score based on market size: 1-3 for emerging/specialty, 4-6 for embedded (SRAM), 7-10 for high-volume (DRAM, NAND).
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the memory technology and market applicability.

questions.question: Does this patent target major memory vendors (Samsung, SK Hynix, Micron) or embedded memory in SoCs?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify specific memory vendors or SoC makers that would implement this.

questions.question: Does this patent improve memory performance (speed, bandwidth) or density? Key competitive differentiators.
Does this patent address memory reliability, endurance, or error correction? Critical for enterprise/automotive.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Assess reliability improvements and target markets.
